description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军二级上将（退役）、中国国民党籍政治人物。曾任国防部长、国家安全会议秘书长等职，是1974年昌平空难的生还者之一。
description.en: A retired General of the Republic of China Army and a politician of the Kuomintang. He served as Minister of National Defense and Secretary-General of the National Security Council, and is one of the survivors of the 1974 Changping air crash.

nodes.id: 国家安全会议 (中华民国)

zh-cn: 国家安全会议 (中华民国)

description.zh-cn: 中华民国总统决定国家安全大政方针的咨询机关。
description.en: An advisory body to the President of the Republic of China for determining major national security policies.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统。
description.en: A politician in the Republic of China who served as the President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国掌管军事及国防事务的最高机构。
description.en: The highest institution in the Republic of China in charge of military and defense affairs.

nodes.id: 中华民国国军退除役官兵辅导委员会

zh-cn: 中华民国国军退除役官兵辅导委员会
行政院国军退除役官兵辅导委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华民国行政院的部会，负责退伍军人的辅导、服务与照顾。
description.en: A ministry of the Executive Yuan of the Republic of China responsible for the guidance, service, and care of veterans.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统。
description.en: A politician in the Republic of China who served as the President of the Republic of China.

zh-cn: 中华民国陆军军官学校

description.zh-cn: 中华民国培养陆军军官的军事院校。
description.en: The military academy of the Republic of China dedicated to training army officers.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军中将，武术家。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the Republic of China Army and a martial artist.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军下士洪仲丘在军中被虐死事件，引发社会舆论及大规模示威，并促成军事审判制度的改革。
description.en: The death of ROC Army Corporal Hung Chung-chiu from abuse in the military, which sparked public outcry, large-scale demonstrations, and led to reforms in the military justice system.

nodes.id: 1974年中华民国陆军UH-1H直升机坠毁事故

zh-cn: 1974年中华民国陆军UH-1H直升机坠毁事故
1974年中华民国陆军UH-1H直升机坠机事件

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军在“昌平演习”期间发生的两架UH-1H直升机坠毁事故，造成多名将校伤亡。
description.en: An accident where two UH-1H helicopters of the Republic of China Army crashed during the 'Changping Exercise', resulting in casualties among several high-ranking officers.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军一级上将，曾任陆军总司令，在1974年昌平空难中受重伤。
description.en: A General of the Republic of China Army who served as Commander-in-Chief of the Army and was seriously injured in the 1974 Changping air crash.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 原名林正义，台湾裔经济学家，曾任世界银行首席经济师兼高级副行长。原为中华民国陆军军官，1979年叛逃至中国大陆。
description.en: Born Lin Zhengyi, a Taiwanese-born economist who served as Chief Economist and Senior Vice President of the World Bank. Originally an officer in the Republic of China Army, he defected to mainland China in 1979.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任国家安全会议秘书长、驻美代表。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who has served as Secretary-General of the National Security Council and Representative to the United States.

nodes.id: 杨念祖 (台湾学政界人物)

zh-cn: 杨念祖 (台湾学政界人物)

description.zh-cn: 中华民国学者及政治人物，曾短暂担任国防部长。
description.en: A scholar and politician of the Republic of China who briefly served as Minister of National Defense.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国外交官及政治人物，曾任外交部长、国家安全会议秘书长。
description.en: A diplomat and politician of the Republic of China who has served as Minister of Foreign Affairs and Secretary-General of the National Security Council.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国空军二级上将（退役），曾任国防部长。
description.en: A retired General of the Republic of China Air Force who served as Minister of National Defense.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的创始政党之一，现为台湾的主要政党之一。
description.en: One of the founding political parties of the Republic of China, and currently one of the major political parties in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国军的军事教育学府，现为国防大学。
description.en: A military educational institution of the Republic of China Armed Forces, now known as the National Defense University.

description.zh-cn: 1949年后海峡两岸最高领导人的首次会晤，在新加坡举行。
description.en: The first meeting between the top leaders of the two sides of the Taiwan Strait since 1949, held in Singapore.

relationships.target: 国家安全会议 (中华民国)

description.zh-cn: 高华柱担任国家安全会议秘书长期间，马英九为时任中华民国总统兼国家安全会议主席。
description.en: While Kao Hua-chu served as Secretary-General of the National Security Council, Ma Ying-jeou was the incumbent President of the Republic of China and Chairman of the National Security Council.

description.zh-cn: 高华柱担任国防部长期间，马英九为时任中华民国总统。
description.en: While Kao Hua-chu served as Minister of National Defense, Ma Ying-jeou was the incumbent President of the Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中华民国国军退除役官兵辅导委员会

position.zh-cn: 国军退除役官兵辅导委员会主任委员

description.zh-cn: 高华柱首次担任退辅会主委期间，陈水扁为时任中华民国总统。
description.en: During Kao Hua-chu's first term as Chairman of the Veterans Affairs Council, Chen Shui-bian was the incumbent President of the Republic of China.

position.zh-cn: 国军退除役官兵辅导委员会主任委员

description.zh-cn: 高华柱再次担任退辅会主委期间，马英九为时任中华民国总统。
description.en: During Kao Hua-chu's second term as Chairman of the Veterans Affairs Council, Ma Ying-jeou was the incumbent President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 高华柱是高芳先的儿子。
description.en: Kao Hua-chu is the son of Kao Fang-hsien.

description.zh-cn: 正37期步兵科毕业。
description.en: Graduated from the 37th class of the Infantry Division.

description.zh-cn: 毕业于陆军指参学院63年班和战争学院正71年班。
description.en: Graduated from the 63rd class of the Army Command and Staff College and the 71st class of the War College.

description.zh-cn: 曾于工程管理系进修。
description.en: Studied at the Department of Engineering Management.

description.zh-cn: 曾于东亚研究所进修。
description.en: Studied at the Institute of Asian Studies.

description.zh-cn: 因洪仲丘事件处理不当，高华柱请辞国防部长并获准，结束其部长任期。
description.en: Due to mismanagement of the Hung Chung-chiu incident, Kao Hua-chu's resignation as Minister of National Defense was accepted, ending his term.

relationships.source: 1974年中华民国陆军UH-1H直升机坠毁事故

description.zh-cn: 高华柱是此次空难的生还者之一，虽身负重伤但仍成功求援，此经历对其军旅生涯有重要影响。
description.en: Kao Hua-chu was one of the survivors of this air crash. Despite being seriously injured, he managed to seek help. This experience had a significant impact on his military career.

description.zh-cn: 在1974年昌平空难中，高华柱身受重伤仍奋不顾身向外求援，使得同机遇难的总司令于豪章得以保住性命。
description.en: In the 1974 Changping air crash, Kao Hua-chu, despite being seriously injured, disregarded his own safety to seek help, which saved the life of Commander-in-Chief Yu Hao-chang, who was on the same helicopter.

description.zh-cn: 在新加坡举行的“两岸领导人会面”（马习会）中，时任国安会秘书长的高华柱陪同马英九与习近平会面。
description.en: During the Ma-Xi meeting in Singapore, Kao Hua-chu, then Secretary-General of the National Security Council, accompanied Ma Ying-jeou to meet with Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 林毅夫投奔中国大陆前，曾于高华柱担任营长的单位服役。
description.en: Before defecting to mainland China, Justin Yifu Lin served in a unit where Kao Hua-chu was the battalion commander.

description.zh-cn: 高华柱接替金溥聪出任国家安全会议秘书长。
description.en: Kao Hua-chu succeeded King Pu-tsung as Secretary-General of the National Security Council.

relationships.target: 杨念祖 (台湾学政界人物)

description.zh-cn: 高华柱因洪仲丘事件请辞国防部长，由杨念祖接任。
description.en: Kao Hua-chu resigned as Minister of National Defense over the Hung Chung-chiu incident, and was succeeded by Andrew Yang.

description.zh-cn: 高华柱的国家安全会议秘书长职位由吴钊燮接任。
description.en: Kao Hua-chu's position as Secretary-General of the National Security Council was succeeded by Joseph Wu.

description.zh-cn: 高华柱接替陈肇敏出任国防部长。
description.en: Kao Hua-chu succeeded Chen Chao-min as Minister of National Defense.

description.zh-cn: 高华柱以国家安全会议秘书长身分陪同马英九总统参加两岸领导人会面，成为第一位以政府官员身份会见习近平的中华民国国军退役将领。
description.en: As Secretary-General of the National Security Council, Kao Hua-chu accompanied President Ma Ying-jeou to the cross-strait leaders' meeting, becoming the first retired ROC military general to meet Xi Jinping in an official government capacity.
